骨老化比以前想象的要复杂一份新的研究论文于2025年3月18日在《老化》（老化 - US）中发表，第17卷，第3期，标题为“线粒体氧化应激或成骨细胞谱系细胞中的自噬减少不足以模仿衰老对骨骼机械性骨骼机械性效果的有害作用”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/bone-aging-isging-is-more-complex-than-than-than-previely-thought.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/bone-aging-isging-is-more-complex-than-than-than-previne.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cd376cc-5d24-473e-ba16-ba16-b9dfdbb5a843 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 15:37:57 -0400 Bone aging is more complex than previously thought
paxlovid发现在新试验中对长期相互救济无效根据4月3日在柳叶刀传染病中发表的一项新研究，抗病毒药nirmatrelvir/ritonavir（Paxlovid）无效缓解长期相互交联症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/paxlovid-found-inefound-ineffective-for-long-long-covid-relief-in-new-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/paxlovid-found-inefound-ineffer-for--for-long-covid-covid-covid-covid-in-new-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=494d93ee-d5f5-4c0b-be62-7ab31f14444a4 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 15:23:00 -0400 Paxlovid found ineffective for long COVID relief in new trial
高胆固醇可能不会表明代谢健康的人的心脏病风险Lundquist在Harbour-UCLA医疗中心的生物医学创新研究所与多个机构的研究人员合作发表了一项新研究，挑战了长期以来的信念，即高胆固醇高胆固醇甚至直接引起冠状动脉疾病，或引起冠状动脉疾病，或者在新代谢健康的个体中的动脉中建立斑块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/high-cholesterol-may-may-not-signal-not-not-disease------------------------------------------- saspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/high-cholesterol-may-may-not-not-not-not-not-disease-risk-risk-in----in-metabol-ytabolatial-shealthable healthy-peeople.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28f571E5-30EC-4C0C-8B93-96478C9710B0 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 15:16:33 -0400 High cholesterol may not signal heart disease risk in metabolically healthy people
简单的血液测试改善了心脏病发作和中风风险的预测研究表明，一项简单的5英镑血液测试可以预测一个人的心脏病发作风险和中风的准确性比以往任何时候都更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/simple-blood-test-improves-prediction-prediction-of-shert-attack-antack-and-stroke-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/simple-blood-test-imprediction-prediction-of-shert-attack-antack-and-stroke-stroke-risk.aspx.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ceb3E197-B211-4731-94FB-2F3563794D4E Mon, 07 Apr 2025 14:54:55 -0400 Simple blood test improves prediction of heart attack and stroke risk
正念和CBT为慢性背痛提供长期缓解腰痛的治疗清单是无止境的，但是很少有四分之一的美国人能够缓解这种持续的疼痛和全球残疾的主要原因。超过80％的患有慢性腰痛的人希望有更好的治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/mindfulness-and-c-bt-provide-long-term-relief-for-for-chronic-back-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/mindfulness-and-and-cbt-provide-long-term-relief-for-chronic-chronic-back-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22f0d702-6085-4b53-4b53-ac5d-6e01464c15c5 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 14:37:06 -0400 Mindfulness and CBT provide long-term relief for chronic back pain
双胞胎开始怀孕的怀孕比单身人士要比预期的要小根据美国国立卫生研究院（NIH）研究人员的一项研究，双胞胎 - 平均而言，平均而不是单身人士，比以前所知。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/twins-begin-pregnancy-smaller-than-singletons-than-singletons-earlier-than-than-xend.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/twins-begin-pregnancy-smaller-than-singletons-than-singletons-earlier-than-than-xexped.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb5934e8-d99b-4f5f-b371-cf2042d475fb Mon, 07 Apr 2025 14:23:48 -0400 Twins begin pregnancy smaller than singletons earlier than expected
多布斯之后，数百万的少女面临堕胎障碍罗特斯健康研究人员称，有超过700万的美国青少年女孩13至17岁，在堕胎禁令，限制性妊娠限制或父母参与要求的州生活。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/millions-of-teen-girls-face-barriers-to-abortion-abortion-access-access-after-ferter-dobbs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/millions-of-teen-girls-face-barriers-to-abortion-abortion-access-access-after-fter-ferter-dobbs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d73fb961-898a-4654-4654-A954-9693D26B88BA Mon, 07 Apr 2025 14:12:01 -0400 Millions of teen girls face barriers to abortion access after Dobbs
新的神经元重建亨廷顿氏病中受损的电路新的研究表明，成人大脑可以产生新的神经元，以整合到关键的运动电路中。研究结果表明，刺激自然脑过程可能有助于修复亨廷顿和其他疾病中受损的神经网络。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-neurons-rebuild-damameged-circuits-circuits-in-huntingtone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/new-neurons-rebuild-damameged-circuits-circuits-in-huntingtone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5B3BC4E6-C0BB-4C09-83A1-CC2A691A74C0 Mon, 07 Apr 2025 14:00:13 -0400 New neurons rebuild damaged circuits in Huntington’s disease
新颖的计算工具可帮助科学家发现疾病背后的隐藏细胞类型整个身体的细胞像合唱团中的歌手一样一起工作，以使我们保持健康，只要他们以完美的和谐工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/novel-computational-tool-helps-helps-scientists-detect-hidded-hidded-cell-cell-cell-types-behind-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/novel-computational-tool-helps-helps-scientists-detect-detect-hidded-cell-cell-types-behind-behind-behind-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2Eda61e6-ac99-4324-9108-f0ea45ecf46b Mon, 07 Apr 2025 13:38:37 -0400 Novel computational tool helps scientists detect hidden cell types behind disease
年轻的女性更容易受到智能手机依赖的社交焦虑今天在欧洲精神病学协会2025年的一项新研究表明，性别在过度和有问题的（心理或行为依赖性）智能手机的使用中起着重要作用，年轻女性比其他性别更有可能经历更高的社交焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/young-females-more-vulnerable-to-social-ancial-anxier-from-smartphone decendence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250407/young-females-more-vulnerable-to-social-ancial-ancial-ancial-ancial-from-smartphone decendence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A4C135D4-00B1-446D-B466-94811EC43D5F Mon, 07 Apr 2025 12:47:01 -0400 Young females more vulnerable to social anxiety from smartphone dependence
